narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The applicant has met the licensing requirements and wishes to be a class "C" exhibitor.  The applicant will mail a
check for the licensing fee to the Animal Care Office in Raleigh, NC.
Record keeping requirements were discussed during the time of inspection.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES ALLOWED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with owner.
